title: Installation issue: LLVM@3.6.2
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

**Prerequisite Step**

Need to have gcc version lower than 8 installed... I went with gcc@6.1.0

```console
spack install gcc@6.1.0
```

As well I found that CMake does not build properly with gcc@6.1.0 so I went with something earlier...

```console
spack install llvm@3.6.2%gcc@6.1.0 ^cmake@3.8.0%gcc@6.1.0
```

Now, some software I am using requires an older version of LLVM, and so I am using Spack to install older versions of dependencies for said software; I'd even say I want to go as far as creating a Spack package for the software as I see it as rather valuable (its software used in research literature, that has been long abandoned but is still widely referred to: https://github.com/HewlettPackard/Atlas). 

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux [REDACTED] 5.3.7-200.fc30.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Oct 18 20:13:59 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

$ lsb_release -d
Description:	Fedora release 30 (Thirty)
``` 

**Packages**

```yaml
packages:
  all:
    compiler: [gcc, intel, pgi, clang, xl, nag, fj]
    providers:
      D: [ldc]
      awk: [gawk]
      blas: [openblas]
      daal: [intel-daal]
      elf: [elfutils]
      fftw-api: [fftw]
      gl: [mesa+opengl, opengl]
      glx: [mesa+glx, opengl]
      glu: [mesa-glu, openglu]
      golang: [gcc]
      ipp: [intel-ipp]
      java: [openjdk, jdk, ibm-java]
      jpeg: [libjpeg-turbo, libjpeg]
      lapack: [openblas]
      mariadb-client: [mariadb-c-client, mariadb]
      mkl: [intel-mkl]
      mpe: [mpe2]
      mpi: [openmpi, mpich]
      mysql-client: [mysql, mariadb-c-client]
      opencl: [pocl]
      pil: [py-pillow]
      pkgconfig: [pkgconf, pkg-config]
      scalapack: [netlib-scalapack]
      szip: [libszip, libaec]
      tbb: [intel-tbb]
      unwind: [libunwind]
    permissions:
      read: world
      write: user

```

**Compilers**

```console

clang@8.0.0

-- gcc fedora30-x86_64 ------------------------------------------
gcc@9.2.1  gcc@6.1.0  gcc@3.4.6

```
